# Install R and R studio

## R

If you are new to R, install R first.

Download the R. <https://www.r-project.org/>

## Rstudio

Then install Rstudio.

Download the Rstudio. <https://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/#download>

Select the free version of RStudio Desktop.
